title: Apogee
description:
Winner of the Best Interactive Award at the University of Montana Media Arts Expo 2015.

Based on my initial pitch, this game was built over the course of 5 months with a team of five digital artists / game designers. Apogee is a first person exploration game, made exclusively for the Oculus Rift. You play as a space rover dropped onto an alien planet, with no context as to why you're there. The game focuses on a growth mechanic, where the player must collect / disperse energy to grow and shrink, granting them access to various places on the planet, to try and piece together the game's backstory. Apogee takes place on a fully spherical planet, which the player can explore in its entirety.
